item.description: Workshop Schedule Monday, 17th April Legend: Talk · Poster · Discussion · Break Time Program Format 09:30 - 09:40 Introductory remarks by the organizing team In-person 09:40 - 10:00 Bernhard Schölkopf: "What is Causal Representation Learning?" In-person 10:00 - 10:20 Xinwei Shen: “Robust Learning: a Causal Representation Perspective” In-person 10:20 - 10:30 Discussion - 10:30 - 11:00 Coffee break - 11:00 - 11:20 Junhyung Park: “A Measure-theoretic Axiomatization of Causality” In-person 11:20 - 11:40 Adele H.

item.title: Home
item.description: Location You can find us at the following address, located at a walking distance of 5 min from the CLeaR conference venue: Max Planck Institute for Intelligent Systems Max-Planck-Ring 4 72076 Tübingen https://goo.gl/maps/oaDHc3XjVej238uj7
